name: C3-PRO Android Framework
short: This framework uses the HAPI ðŸ”¥FHIR library and ResearchStack to bring C3-PRO to Android.
description: Combining ðŸ”¥FHIR and ResearchStack, this Android framework allows you to use FHIR `Questionnaire` resources directly with ResearchStack and will return FHIR `QuestionnaireResponse` that you can send to your server. In addition, a FHIR `Contract` resource can be used to carry trial eligibility requirements and define content to be shown during consenting.
